desc: Viking jewellery by artist Alban Depper, designer and maker of exquisite, replica and original Viking jewellery, for over 30 years. Unlock your inner Viking and buy direct from the craftsman's hands. All fully UK hallmarked Sterling silver, with unique makers stamp.

layout.text: BUY DIRECT FROM THE CRAFTSMAN'S HANDS

Welcome to the home of viking jewellery by artist Alban Depper
designer and maker of traditional viking art for 30 years
Original pieces recreated by hand from ancient treasures
The past, reflected within the present
